description: AVN Award winning performer, Brooklyn Lee, is here to put you in your place, at her feet. She is so fed up with your lackluster submission ways. She’ll give you this one opportunity to experience what a reward would look and feel like. She’ll give you just enough to bring you to your pathetic knees, crying and begging for more. She’ll give you all of this just before she breaks your soul, kicks you out and leaves you in search of a new mistress. Because Brooklyn Lee will not tollerate a sad shriveled worm in her presence.
title: POV FemDom: You are Pathetic Putty
